mapper.insert: insert into o_student (no, name, gender, phone,email,uuid) values (#{student.no},#{student.name},#{student.gender},#{student.phone},#{student.email},#{student.uuid});

insert into t_user (username, password, roleId, available, name, staff, phone,email) values (#{user.username},#{user.password},#{user.roleId},#{user.available},#{user.name},#{user.staff},#{user.phone},#{user.email});
mapper.select: select COUNT(1) from o_student_classes WHERE classes_id = #{classId} AND student_id = #{studentId}
select o_classes.*,o_teacher.name teaName from o_classes,o_teacher WHERE code = #{code} and o_teacher.id=o_classes.teacher_id
SELECT count(*) FROM t_user as tu where (tu.email=#{email} or tu.username=#{no} or tu.phone=#{phone})
